title: Broken Bow, Part I
synopsis: Captain Archer and the crew of the Enterprise embark on their first mission, transporting a wounded Klingon back to his homeworld.

title: Broken Bow, Part II
synopsis: The Enterprise crew faces their first major challenge as they navigate Klingon politics and confront the mysterious Suliban.

title: Fight or Flight
synopsis: The crew discovers a derelict alien ship with its crew drained of fluids, leading to a confrontation with the perpetrators.

title: Strange New World
synopsis: An away team experiences disturbing hallucinations on a seemingly idyllic planet, testing their trust in each other.

title: Unexpected
synopsis: Trip Tucker becomes pregnant after an encounter with an alien species, leading to complications and cultural misunderstandings.

title: Terra Nova
synopsis: The Enterprise investigates the fate of a long-lost human colony, only to find that the settlers have devolved into a primitive society.

title: The Andorian Incident
synopsis: The Enterprise crew visits a Vulcan monastery, where they become embroiled in a conflict with the Andorians.

title: Breaking the Ice
synopsis: The crew explores a comet and must rescue a stranded team member, while dealing with the tensions between T'Pol and the rest of the crew.

title: Civilization
synopsis: The crew discovers a pre-industrial society being exploited by a more advanced alien race, leading to a delicate intervention.

title: Fortunate Son
synopsis: The Enterprise comes to the aid of a human freighter attacked by Nausicaan pirates, but the situation grows tense when the freighter's crew seeks revenge.

title: Cold Front
synopsis: A temporal agent from the future warns Archer about a Suliban plot, bringing the Enterprise into the Temporal Cold War.

title: Silent Enemy
synopsis: The Enterprise faces a mysterious and powerful alien vessel that attacks without warning, forcing the crew to prepare for battle.

title: Dear Doctor
synopsis: Dr. Phlox faces an ethical dilemma when the Enterprise encounters a species with a genetic illness that could determine their evolutionary future.

title: Sleeping Dogs
synopsis: The crew discovers a disabled Klingon ship in a gas giant's atmosphere and must find a way to escape before they are trapped.

title: Shadows of P'Jem
synopsis: Archer and T'Pol are captured by Andorians, and the situation complicates when the Vulcan High Command orders T'Pol's transfer.

title: Shuttlepod One
synopsis: Trip and Reed are stranded in a damaged shuttlepod and believe that the Enterprise has been destroyed, leading to a tense struggle for survival.

title: Fusion
synopsis: T'Pol confronts her emotions and past traumas when the Enterprise encounters a group of Vulcans who embrace their emotions.

title: Rogue Planet
synopsis: The crew explores a dark, mysterious planet and Archer encounters an enigmatic alien entity with a connection to his past.

title: Acquisition
synopsis: Ferengi pirates board the Enterprise and attempt to steal the ship's valuables, leading to a battle of wits with the crew.

title: Oasis
synopsis: The crew discovers a seemingly abandoned alien ship, but the survivors harbor a dark secret about their existence.

title: Detained
synopsis: Archer and Mayweather are captured by a Tandarans and placed in a detention camp where they encounter the Suliban.

title: Vox Sola
synopsis: A strange alien organism invades the Enterprise, trapping several crew members, and the crew must find a way to communicate with it.

title: Fallen Hero
synopsis: The Enterprise is tasked with transporting a disgraced Vulcan ambassador, but the mission becomes dangerous when they are pursued by hostile forces.

title: Desert Crossing
synopsis: Archer and Trip are invited to a desert planet by a charismatic leader, but find themselves caught in the middle of a political conflict.

title: Two Days and Two Nights
synopsis: The crew enjoys shore leave on the pleasure planet Risa, but their vacations are interrupted by unexpected complications.

title: Shockwave, Part I
synopsis: A mission to a mining colony ends in disaster, leading to the suspension of the Enterprise's mission and a deeper involvement in the Temporal Cold War.

title: Shockwave, Part II
synopsis: Archer and the Enterprise crew race to stop a temporal agent from altering history, while dealing with the aftermath of the mining colony disaster.

title: Carbon Creek
synopsis: T'Pol tells the story of how Vulcans made first contact with humans in the 1950s, challenging the official history.

title: Minefield
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes ensnared in a Romulan minefield, and Reed must undertake a dangerous mission to save the ship.

title: Dead Stop
synopsis: After suffering severe damage, the Enterprise docks at an automated repair station, only to discover that it harbors a sinister secret.

title: A Night in Sickbay
synopsis: Captain Archer faces a diplomatic crisis while dealing with his ailing dog Porthos and unresolved personal tensions.

title: Marauders
synopsis: The crew helps a mining colony defend itself against Klingon marauders who have been extorting them for resources.

title: The Seventh
synopsis: T'Pol is sent on a mission to capture a fugitive from her past, and must confront unresolved issues related to her previous command.

title: The Communicator
synopsis: Archer and Reed accidentally leave a communicator on a pre-warp planet, leading to potential contamination of the society.

title: Singularity
synopsis: The crew begins to exhibit obsessive behavior while investigating a black hole, leading to a near-catastrophic situation.

title: Vanishing Point
synopsis: After experiencing transporter-related anomalies, Hoshi Sato begins to fear that she is fading out of existence.

title: Precious Cargo
synopsis: Trip Tucker is captured by a group of aliens and must protect a kidnapped princess from their clutches.

title: The Catwalk
synopsis: The crew takes refuge in the ship's catwalk during a dangerous radiation storm, leading to tense interactions in close quarters.

title: Dawn
synopsis: Trip Tucker is stranded on a hostile planet and must work with a wounded alien to survive the harsh conditions.

title: Stigma
synopsis: T'Pol faces prejudice and potential career-ending consequences when her secret battle with a Vulcan neurological disease is revealed.

title: Cease Fire
synopsis: Archer is called upon to mediate a ceasefire between the Vulcans and Andorians, but the mission proves more difficult than expected.

title: Future Tense
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers a mysterious ship that appears to have time-travel capabilities, drawing the attention of both the Suliban and the Tholians.

title: Canamar
synopsis: Archer and Trip are wrongfully imprisoned in a brutal alien detention center and must find a way to escape.

title: The Crossing
synopsis: Non-corporeal aliens take control of the crew's bodies, leading to a fight for survival aboard the Enterprise.

title: Judgment
synopsis: Archer is captured and put on trial by the Klingons for his actions, leading to a tense courtroom drama.

title: Horizon
synopsis: Mayweather returns to his family's cargo ship, only to find that his absence has created tensions and challenges.

title: The Breach
synopsis: The Enterprise crew helps evacuate a group of Denobulan geologists from a war-torn planet, while Phlox confronts his own prejudices.

title: Cogenitor
synopsis: Trip Tucker befriends a member of an alien species' third gender, leading to unintended consequences that challenge the crew's ethical beliefs.

title: Regeneration
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters Borg drones who were revived after being frozen in the Arctic, leading to a deadly confrontation.

title: First Flight
synopsis: Archer recalls his early days in the NX program and the loss of a close friend, as the Enterprise undertakes a dangerous mission.

title: Bounty
synopsis: Archer is captured by a Tellarite bounty hunter, while T'Pol struggles with the effects of a contagious Vulcan condition.

title: The Expanse
synopsis: A mysterious alien probe attacks Earth, prompting Archer and the crew to venture into the dangerous Delphic Expanse.

title: The Xindi
synopsis: The Enterprise begins its mission in the Delphic Expanse to track down the Xindi and prevent them from destroying Earth.

title: Anomaly
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a series of spatial anomalies that damage the ship, while dealing with raiders who steal vital supplies.

title: Extinction
synopsis: Archer, Reed, and Hoshi are infected by a virus that alters their DNA, turning them into a different species.

title: Rajiin
synopsis: The Enterprise takes on a mysterious passenger who turns out to be a spy for the Xindi, leading to a dangerous confrontation.

title: Impulse
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a Vulcan ship abandoned in a dangerous region, with its crew exhibiting violent behavior.

title: Exile
synopsis: The Enterprise crew meets a mysterious alien who possesses information about the Xindi, but who has their own hidden agenda.

title: The Shipment
synopsis: The crew discovers an alien freighter carrying a shipment that could be used by the Xindi to further their destructive plans.

title: Twilight
synopsis: A temporal anomaly causes Archer and T'Pol to experience an alternate reality where the Xindi have destroyed Earth.

title: North Star
synopsis: The Enterprise crew discovers a planet where humans have settled and are living under oppressive rule by an alien species.

title: Similitude
synopsis: Archer faces a moral dilemma when the ship's only chance of survival requires sacrificing a clone of Trip Tucker.

title: Carpenter Street
synopsis: Archer and T'Pol travel back in time to 21st-century Earth to stop a Xindi bioweapon plot.

title: Chosen Realm
synopsis: Religious zealots hijack the Enterprise, believing the ship is key to their prophecy.

title: Proving Ground
synopsis: The Andorians offer to help Enterprise in its mission to stop the Xindi weapon, but their motives are unclear.

title: Stratagem
synopsis: Archer and Degra, the Xindi weapon designer, play a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse aboard a captured ship.

title: Harbinger
synopsis: Tensions rise among the crew as they face an alien visitor who may hold the key to understanding the Delphic Expanse.

title: Doctor's Orders
synopsis: Dr. Phlox must keep the ship running alone while the rest of the crew is in stasis during a perilous journey through a dangerous region of space.

title: Hatchery
synopsis: Archer becomes obsessed with protecting a Xindi-Insectoid hatchery, leading the crew to question his judgment.

title: Azati Prime
synopsis: The Enterprise reaches the Xindi weapon construction site, leading to a deadly confrontation and Archer's capture.

title: Damage
synopsis: The ship is crippled, and Archer is forced to make a morally questionable decision to continue the mission.

title: The Forgotten
synopsis: Archer struggles with the emotional fallout from his decisions as the crew continues to fight for their survival.

title: E²
synopsis: Enterprise encounters an alternate version of itself from the future, and Archer must confront the potential consequences of his mission.

title: The Council
synopsis: Archer and his crew finally confront the Xindi Council and attempt to prevent the launch of the superweapon.

title: Countdown
synopsis: The Xindi superweapon is completed, and the crew races against time to prevent its deployment.

title: Zero Hour
synopsis: In the season finale, Archer leads a final assault to destroy the Xindi superweapon and save Earth.

title: Storm Front, Part I
synopsis: The Enterprise crew finds themselves in an alternate timeline where the Nazis have taken over the Eastern United States.

title: Storm Front, Part II
synopsis: Archer and the crew work to correct the timeline, battling both the Nazis and temporal agents in the process.

title: Home
synopsis: After returning to Earth, the crew struggles to adjust to normal life and deal with the emotional aftermath of their mission.

title: Borderland
synopsis: The Enterprise crew faces off against genetically enhanced superhumans, descendants of Khan's followers.

title: Cold Station 12
synopsis: Archer and his team discover a secret facility where unethical genetic experiments are being conducted on human embryos.

title: The Augments
synopsis: The Enterprise crew must prevent a war when the Augments attempt to hijack a Klingon Bird-of-Prey.

title: The Forge
synopsis: The crew travels to Vulcan to investigate the bombing of the Earth embassy and uncover a conspiracy within the Vulcan High Command.

title: Awakening
synopsis: Archer and T'Pol delve deeper into the Vulcan conspiracy, encountering a group of renegade Vulcans with radical ideas.

title: Kir'Shara
synopsis: Archer and T'Pol race against time to deliver the Kir'Shara, an ancient Vulcan artifact, to prevent a civil war on Vulcan.

title: Daedalus
synopsis: The inventor of the transporter joins the Enterprise on a mission to rescue his son, lost in a transporter experiment gone wrong.

title: Observer Effect
synopsis: Non-corporeal aliens observe the Enterprise crew as they face a deadly virus, evaluating humanity's worthiness for first contact.

title: Babel One
synopsis: The Enterprise mediates peace talks between the Andorians and Tellarites, but a Romulan plot threatens to derail the negotiations.

title: United
synopsis: Archer tries to unite the Andorians, Tellarites, and Vulcans to confront the Romulan threat.

title: The Aenar
synopsis: The crew discovers that the Romulan drone ships are controlled by a telepathic Andorian subspecies known as the Aenar.

title: Affliction
synopsis: Phlox is kidnapped by the Klingons to help them deal with a deadly virus, leading to the creation of the Klingon augment virus.

title: Divergence
synopsis: Archer and the crew race to save Phlox and prevent the Klingon virus from spreading, while dealing with a divided Klingon Empire.

title: Bound
synopsis: The Enterprise crew faces temptation and danger when three Orion women come aboard the ship with ulterior motives.

title: In a Mirror, Darkly, Part I
synopsis: In the Mirror Universe, a power-hungry Archer seizes control of the ISS Enterprise and pursues a powerful alien ship.

title: In a Mirror, Darkly, Part II
synopsis: Archer's quest for power in the Mirror Universe leads to betrayal and a struggle for control of the alien ship.

title: Demons
synopsis: A xenophobic faction on Earth threatens to derail the formation of the United Federation of Planets.

title: Terra Prime
synopsis: The crew must stop a radical group led by Terra Prime from using a deadly weapon to enforce their isolationist agenda.

title: These Are the Voyages...
synopsis: In the series finale, a historical holoprogram reveals the final mission of the Enterprise crew and the signing of the Federation Charter.
